verse: आत्मारामस्य कृष्णस्य ध्रुवमात्मास्ति राधिका । तस्या दास्यप्रभावेण विरहोऽस्मान्न संस्पृशेत् ॥

terms.आत्मारामस्य: of the one who finds pleasure in himself (Krishna)
terms.दास्य: प्रभावेण - through the power of devotion

meaning: Translation:Undoubtedly, there exists a self for Krishna who finds pleasure in himself. That self is Radha. Through the power of her devotion, separation from her does not touch us.
